info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: Gets all the WAF policies in a subscription.
Lists available Ssl options for configuring Ssl policy.
Lists all SSL predefined policies for configuring Ssl policy.
Gets Ssl predefined policy with the specified policy name.

parameters.name: predefinedPolicyName
parameters.description: The name of the ssl predefined policy.

get.description: Lists all available web application firewall rule sets.
Gets all the application gateways in a subscription.
Gets the regional application gateway waf manifest.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which the WAF dynamic manifest is requested.

get.description: Gets the regional application gateway waf manifest.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location for which the WAF dynamic manifest is requested.

get.description: Lists all of the protection policies within a resource group.
Retrieve protection policy with specified name within a resource group.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

put.description: Creates or update policy with specified rule set name within a resource group.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Policy to be created.

parameters.name: policyName
parameters.description: The name of the policy.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

get.description: Lists all application gateways in a resource group.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

put.description: Creates or updates the specified application gateway.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: Parameters supplied to the create or update application gateway operation.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: A link to the status monitor

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.description: Parameters supplied to update application gateway tags.

parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Gets the backend health of the specified application gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: applicationGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the application gateway.

parameters.name: $expand
parameters.description: Expands BackendAddressPool and BackendHttpSettings referenced in backend health.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

post.description: Gets the backend health for given combination of backend pool and http setting of the specified application gateway in a resource group.

parameters.description: Expands BackendAddressPool and BackendHttpSettings referenced in backend health.

Location.description: The Location header contains the URL where the status of the long running operation can be checked.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

zones.description: A list of availability zones denoting where the resource needs to come from.

identity.description: The identity of the application gateway, if configured.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway authentication certificate.

name.description: Name of the authentication certificate that is unique within an Application Gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the authentication certificate resource.

minCapacity.description: Lower bound on number of Application Gateway capacity.

maxCapacity.description: Upper bound on number of Application Gateway capacity.

ApplicationGatewayBackendAddress.description: Backend address of an application gateway.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway backend address pool.

name.description: Name of the backend address pool that is unique within an Application Gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationGatewayBackendAddressPoolProp.description: Properties of Backend Address Pool of an application gateway.

backendIPConfigurations.description: Collection of references to IPs defined in network interfaces.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the backend address pool resource.

ApplicationGatewayBackendHealth.description: Response for ApplicationGatewayBackendHealth API service call.

ApplicationGatewayBackendHealthOnDemand.description: Result of on demand test probe.

address.description: IP address or FQDN of backend server.

ipConfiguration.description: Reference to IP configuration of backend server.

ApplicationGatewayBackendHttpSettings.description: Backend address pool settings of an application gateway.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway backend HTTP settings.

name.description: Name of the backend http settings that is unique within an Application Gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationGatewayBackendHttpSettingsPro.description: Properties of Backend address pool settings of an application gateway.

port.description: The destination port on the backend.

protocol.description: The protocol used to communicate with the backend.

requestTimeout.description: Request timeout in seconds. Application Gateway will fail the request if response is not received within RequestTimeout. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

probe.description: Probe resource of an application gateway.

authenticationCertificates.description: Array of references to application gateway authentication certificates.

trustedRootCertificates.description: Array of references to application gateway trusted root certificates.

connectionDraining.description: Connection draining of the backend http settings resource.

hostName.description: Host header to be sent to the backend servers.

pickHostNameFromBackendAddress.description: Whether to pick host header should be picked from the host name of the backend server. Default value is false.

affinityCookieName.description: Cookie name to use for the affinity cookie.

probeEnabled.description: Whether the probe is enabled. Default value is false.

path.description: Path which should be used as a prefix for all HTTP requests. Null means no path will be prefixed. Default value is null.

dedicatedBackendConnection.description: Enable or disable dedicated connection per backend server. Default is set to false.

validateCertChainAndExpiry.description: Verify or skip both chain and expiry validations of the certificate on the backend server. Default is set to true.

validateSNI.description: When enabled, verifies if the Common Name of the certificate provided by the backend server matches the Server Name Indication (SNI) value. Default value is true.

sniName.description: Specify an SNI value to match the common name of the certificate on the backend. By default, the application gateway uses the incoming requests host header as the SNI. Default value is null.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the backend HTTP settings resource.

ApplicationGatewayBackendSettings.description: Backend address pool settings of an application gateway.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway backend settings.

name.description: Name of the backend settings that is unique within an Application Gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationGatewayBackendSettingsPropert.description: Properties of Backend address pool settings of an application gateway.

port.description: The destination port on the backend.

protocol.description: The protocol used to communicate with the backend.

timeout.description: Connection timeout in seconds. Application Gateway will fail the request if response is not received within ConnectionTimeout. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

probe.description: Probe resource of an application gateway.

trustedRootCertificates.description: Array of references to application gateway trusted root certificates.

hostName.description: Server name indication to be sent to the backend servers for Tls protocol.

pickHostNameFromBackendAddress.description: Whether to pick server name indication from the host name of the backend server for Tls protocol. Default value is false.

enableL4ClientIpPreservation.description: Whether to send Proxy Protocol header to backend servers over TCP or TLS protocols. Default value is false.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the backend HTTP settings resource.

verifyClientCertIssuerDN.description: Verify client certificate issuer name on the application gateway.

ApplicationGatewayConnectionDraining.description: Connection draining allows open connections to a backend server to be active for a specified time after the backend server got removed from the configuration.

enabled.description: Whether connection draining is enabled or not.

drainTimeoutInSec.description: The number of seconds connection draining is active. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 3600 seconds.

ApplicationGatewayCustomError.description: Custom error of an application gateway.

statusCode.description: Status code of the application gateway custom error.

customErrorPageUrl.description: Error page URL of the application gateway custom error.

ApplicationGatewayEntraJWTValidationConf.description: Entra JWT Validation Configuration of an application gateway.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway entra jwt validation configuration.

name.description: Name of the entra jwt validation configuration that is unique within an application gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationGatewayEntraJWTValidationConf.description: Properties of entra jwt validation configuration of the application gateway.

tenantId.description: The Tenant ID of the Microsoft Entra ID application.

clientId.description: The Client ID of the Microsoft Entra ID application.

audiences.description: List of acceptable audience claims that can be present in the token (aud claim). A maximum of 5 audiences are permitted.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the entra jwt validation configuration resource.

ApplicationGatewayFirewallDisabledRuleGr.description: Allows to disable rules within a rule group or an entire rule group.

ruleGroupName.description: The name of the rule group that will be disabled.

rules.description: The list of rules that will be disabled. If null, all rules of the rule group will be disabled.

ApplicationGatewayFirewallExclusion.description: Allow to exclude some variable satisfy the condition for the WAF check.

selectorMatchOperator.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operate on the selector to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to.

selector.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operator used to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to.

ruleGroups.description: The rule groups of the web application firewall rule set.

action.description: The string representation of the web application firewall rule action.

sensitivity.description: The string representation of the web application firewall rule sensitivity.

description.description: The description of the web application firewall rule.

headerValue.description: Header value of the header configuration.

weightPerServer.description: Weight per server. Range between 1 and 100.

backendAddressPool.description: Backend address pool resource of the application gateway.

ApplicationGatewayOnDemandProbe.description: Details of on demand test probe request.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the probe.

host.description: Host name to send the probe to.

path.description: Relative path of probe. Valid path starts from '/'. Probe is sent to <Protocol>://<host>:<port><path>.

timeout.description: The probe timeout in seconds. Probe marked as failed if valid response is not received with this timeout period. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

pickHostNameFromBackendHttpSettings.description: Whether the host header should be picked from the backend http settings. Default value is false.

enableProbeProxyProtocolHeader.description: Whether to send Proxy Protocol header along with the Health Probe over TCP or TLS protocol. Default value is false.

match.description: Criterion for classifying a healthy probe response.

backendAddressPool.description: Reference to backend pool of application gateway to which probe request will be sent.

backendHttpSettings.description: Reference to backend http setting of application gateway to be used for test probe.

redirectConfiguration.description: Redirect configuration resource of URL path map path rule.

rewriteRuleSet.description: Rewrite rule set resource of URL path map path rule.

loadDistributionPolicy.description: Load Distribution Policy resource of URL path map path rule.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the path rule resource.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway private link resource.

ApplicationGatewayPrivateLinkResourcePro.description: Properties of a private link resource.

groupId.description: Group identifier of private link resource.

requiredMembers.description: Required member names of private link resource.

requiredZoneNames.description: Required DNS zone names of the the private link resource.

properties.description: Properties of the application gateway probe.

name.description: Name of the probe that is unique within an Application Gateway.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

ApplicationGatewayProbeHealthResponseMat.description: Application gateway probe health response match.

body.description: Body that must be contained in the health response. Default value is empty.

statusCodes.description: Allowed ranges of healthy status codes. Default range of healthy status codes is 200-399.

ApplicationGatewayProbePropertiesFormat.description: Properties of probe of an application gateway.

protocol.description: The protocol used for the probe.

host.description: Host name to send the probe to.

path.description: Relative path of probe. Valid path starts from '/'. Probe is sent to <Protocol>://<host>:<port><path>.

interval.description: The probing interval in seconds. This is the time interval between two consecutive probes. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

timeout.description: The probe timeout in seconds. Probe marked as failed if valid response is not received with this timeout period. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 86400 seconds.

unhealthyThreshold.description: The probe retry count. Backend server is marked down after consecutive probe failure count reaches UnhealthyThreshold. Acceptable values are from 1 second to 20.

pickHostNameFromBackendHttpSettings.description: Whether the host header should be picked from the backend http settings. Default value is false.

pickHostNameFromBackendSettings.description: Whether the server name indication should be picked from the backend settings for Tls protocol. Default value is false.

minServers.description: Minimum number of servers that are always marked healthy. Default value is 0.

match.description: Criterion for classifying a healthy probe response.

enableProbeProxyProtocolHeader.description: Whether to send Proxy Protocol header along with the Health Probe over TCP or TLS protocol. Default value is false.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the probe resource.

port.description: Custom port which will be used for probing the backend servers. The valid value ranges from 1 to 65535. In case not set, port from http settings will be used. This property is valid for Basic, Standard_v2 and WAF_v2 only.

sku.description: SKU of the application gateway resource.

sslPolicy.description: SSL policy of the application gateway resource.

operationalState.description: Operational state of the application gateway resource.

gatewayIPConfigurations.description: Subnets of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

authenticationCertificates.description: Authentication certificates of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

trustedRootCertificates.description: Trusted Root certificates of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

trustedClientCertificates.description: Trusted client certificates of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

sslCertificates.description: SSL certificates of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

frontendIPConfigurations.description: Frontend IP addresses of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

frontendPorts.description: Frontend ports of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

probes.description: Probes of the application gateway resource.

backendAddressPools.description: Backend address pool of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

backendHttpSettingsCollection.description: Backend http settings of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

backendSettingsCollection.description: Backend settings of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

httpListeners.description: Http listeners of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

listeners.description: Listeners of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

sslProfiles.description: SSL profiles of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

urlPathMaps.description: URL path map of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

requestRoutingRules.description: Request routing rules of the application gateway resource.

routingRules.description: Routing rules of the application gateway resource.

rewriteRuleSets.description: Rewrite rules for the application gateway resource.

redirectConfigurations.description: Redirect configurations of the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

enableHttp2.description: Whether HTTP2 is enabled on the application gateway resource.

enableFips.description: Whether FIPS is enabled on the application gateway resource.

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private Endpoint connections on application gateway.

resourceGuid.description: The resource GUID property of the application gateway resource.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the application gateway resource.

customErrorConfigurations.description: Custom error configurations of the application gateway resource.

forceFirewallPolicyAssociation.description: If true, associates a firewall policy with an application gateway regardless whether the policy differs from the WAF Config.

loadDistributionPolicies.description: Load distribution policies of the application gateway resource.

entraJWTValidationConfigs.description: Entra JWT validation configurations for the application gateway resource. For default limits, see [Application Gateway limits](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-subscription-service-limits#application-gateway-limits).

ApplicationGatewayUrlConfiguration.description: Url configuration of the Actions set in Application Gateway.

modifiedQueryString.description: Query string which user has provided for url rewrite. Null means no query string will be updated. Default value is null.

reroute.description: If set as true, it will re-evaluate the url path map provided in path based request routing rules using modified path. Default value is false.

ApplicationGatewayWebApplicationFirewall.description: Application gateway web application firewall configuration.

enabled.description: Whether the web application firewall is enabled or not.

ruleSetType.description: The type of the web application firewall rule set. Possible values are: 'OWASP'.

ruleSetVersion.description: The version of the rule set type.

requestBodyCheck.description: Whether allow WAF to check request Body.

maxRequestBodySize.description: Maximum request body size for WAF.

maxRequestBodySizeInKb.description: Maximum request body size in Kb for WAF.

fileUploadLimitInMb.description: Maximum file upload size in Mb for WAF.

DefaultRuleSetPropertyFormat.description: the default web application firewall rule set.

ruleSetType.description: The type of the web application firewall rule set.

ruleSetVersion.description: The version of the web application firewall rule set type.

ExceptionEntry.description: Adds exception to allow a request when the condition is satisfied.

matchVariable.description: The variable on which we evaluate the exception condition

valueMatchOperator.description: Operates on the allowed values for the matchVariable

selectorMatchOperator.description: When the matchVariable points to a key-value pair (e.g, RequestHeader), this operates on the selector

selector.description: When the matchVariable points to a key-value pair (e.g, RequestHeader), this identifies the key.

exceptionManagedRuleSets.description: The managed rule sets that are associated with the exception.

ExclusionManagedRule.description: Defines a managed rule to use for exclusion.

ExclusionManagedRuleGroup.description: Defines a managed rule group to use for exclusion.

ruleGroupName.description: The managed rule group for exclusion.

rules.description: List of rules that will be excluded. If none specified, all rules in the group will be excluded.

ExclusionManagedRuleSet.description: Defines a managed rule set for Exclusions.

ruleSetType.description: Defines the rule set type to use.

ruleSetVersion.description: Defines the version of the rule set to use.

ruleGroups.description: Defines the rule groups to apply to the rule set.

GroupByUserSession.description: Define user session identifier group by clauses.

groupByVariables.description: List of group by clause variables.

GroupByVariable.description: Define user session group by clause variables.

HeaderValueMatcher.description: An optional field under "Rewrite Action". It lets you capture and modify the value(s) of a specific header when multiple headers with the same name exist. Currently supported for Set-Cookie Response header only. For more details, visit https://aka.ms/appgwheadercrud

pattern.description: The pattern, either fixed string or regular expression, that evaluates if a header value should be selected for rewrite.

ignoreCase.description: Setting this parameter to truth value with force the pattern to do a case in-sensitive comparison.

negate.description: Setting this value as truth will force to check the negation of the condition given by the user in the pattern field.

ManagedRuleGroupOverride.description: Defines a managed rule group override setting.

ruleGroupName.description: The managed rule group to override.

rules.description: List of rules that will be disabled. If none specified, all rules in the group will be disabled.

ManagedRuleOverride.description: Defines a managed rule group override setting.

state.description: The state of the managed rule. Defaults to Disabled if not specified.

action.description: Describes the override action to be applied when rule matches.

sensitivity.description: Describes the override sensitivity to be applied when rule matches.

ruleSetType.description: Defines the rule set type to use.

ruleSetVersion.description: Defines the version of the rule set to use.

ruleGroupOverrides.description: Defines the rule group overrides to apply to the rule set.

computedDisabledRules.description: Stores the final list of disabled rule groups

ManagedRuleSetRuleGroup.description: Defines a managed rule set rule group

rules.description: List of rules within the rule group

ManagedRulesDefinition.description: Allow to exclude some variable satisfy the condition for the WAF check.

exceptions.description: The exceptions that are applied on the policy.

exclusions.description: The Exclusions that are applied on the policy.

managedRuleSets.description: The managed rule sets that are associated with the policy.

negationConditon.description: Whether this is negate condition or not.

OwaspCrsExclusionEntry.description: Allow to exclude some variable satisfy the condition for the WAF check.

selectorMatchOperator.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operate on the selector to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to.

selector.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operator used to specify which elements in the collection this exclusion applies to.

exclusionManagedRuleSets.description: The managed rule sets that are associated with the exclusion.

PolicySettings.description: Defines contents of a web application firewall global configuration.

requestBodyCheck.description: Whether to allow WAF to check request Body.

requestBodyInspectLimitInKB.description: Max inspection limit in KB for request body inspection for WAF.

requestBodyEnforcement.description: Whether allow WAF to enforce request body limits.

maxRequestBodySizeInKb.description: Maximum request body size in Kb for WAF.

fileUploadEnforcement.description: Whether allow WAF to enforce file upload limits.

fileUploadLimitInMb.description: Maximum file upload size in Mb for WAF.

customBlockResponseStatusCode.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response status code.

customBlockResponseBody.description: If the action type is block, customer can override the response body. The body must be specified in base64 encoding.

jsChallengeCookieExpirationInMins.description: Web Application Firewall JavaScript Challenge Cookie Expiration time in minutes.

state.description: State of the log scrubbing config. Default value is Enabled.

scrubbingRules.description: The rules that are applied to the logs for scrubbing.

WebApplicationFirewallCustomRule.description: Defines contents of a web application rule.

name.description: The name of the resource that is unique within a policy. This name can be used to access the resource.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

priority.description: Priority of the rule. Rules with a lower value will be evaluated before rules with a higher value.

state.description: Describes if the custom rule is in enabled or disabled state. Defaults to Enabled if not specified.

rateLimitDuration.description: Duration over which Rate Limit policy will be applied. Applies only when ruleType is RateLimitRule.

rateLimitThreshold.description: Rate Limit threshold to apply in case ruleType is RateLimitRule. Must be greater than or equal to 1

groupByUserSession.description: List of user session identifier group by clauses.

properties.description: Properties of the web application firewall policy.

etag.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

value.description: The WebApplicationFirewallPolicy items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items

WebApplicationFirewallPolicyPropertiesFo.description: Defines web application firewall policy properties.

customRules.description: The custom rules inside the policy.

applicationGateways.description: A collection of references to application gateways.

provisioningState.description: The provisioning state of the web application firewall policy resource.

httpListeners.description: A collection of references to application gateway http listeners.

pathBasedRules.description: A collection of references to application gateway path rules.

applicationGatewayForContainers.description: A collection of references to application gateway for containers.

WebApplicationFirewallScrubbingRules.description: Allow certain variables to be scrubbed on WAF logs

matchVariable.description: The variable to be scrubbed from the logs.

selectorMatchOperator.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operate on the selector to specify which elements in the collection this rule applies to.

selector.description: When matchVariable is a collection, operator used to specify which elements in the collection this rule applies to.

state.description: Defines the state of log scrubbing rule. Default value is Enabled.
